tool_description: Provides real-time monitoring and alerting for cart abandonment metrics, recovery campaign performance, and checkout flow anomalies.

dashboard_type.description: Type of dashboard: overview, abandonment, recovery, checkout_flow

error_messages: Invalid dashboard_type: Must be one of [overview, abandonment, recovery, checkout_flow]
Invalid time_window: Must be one of [1h, 6h, 24h]
Invalid alert_thresholds: Must contain valid threshold configurations
Invalid auto_refresh_seconds: Must be between 60 and 3600 seconds
usage: Create real-time dashboards by specifying dashboard_type and time_window. Configure alert_thresholds and auto_refresh_seconds for monitoring needs.

current_abandonment_rate.description: Current cart abandonment rate as percentage

real_time_conversions.description: Conversions in the current time window
